Html:
Hello,

My application will be used onto interactive whiteboard. Because some users are small, I want to give the choice to show the Ribbon bar at the application top side or the application downside.

I'm using the Ribbon CTP (ver 3:5:31016:1 of RibbonControlsLibrary assembly) onto a Windows 7 RC1 (build 7100). I have some problems when I try to show the Ribbon bar at the application bottomside.

Have you plan this possibility ?

Thanks.
The Office 2007 UI Guidelines explicitly prohibit the placement of the ribbon anywhere apart from at the top of the window.
